Uses of Class
exceptions.FatalInternalException

  • Packages that use FatalInternalException 
    Package Description
    servlets  

    • Uses of FatalInternalException in servlets

      Methods in servlets that throw FatalInternalException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.lang.String WebServlet.checkinFormRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Gets venues visited by a user over a number of days and return in the form of a JSON string The user is also returned if it is the first request Saves examined data in the system datastore in a background thread
      private java.lang.String WebServlet.fetchTweetsForProfile(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Fetches tweets made by a user in the form of a JSON string
      private java.lang.String WebServlet.fetchUserForProfile(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Fetches user information from a given username in the form of a JSON string
      private java.lang.String WebServlet.getNearbyVenues(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Gets a list of nearby places from coordinates provided in the request object.
      private java.lang.String WebServlet.keywordFormRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Gets frequently used terms amongst several users in the form of a JSON string Saves examined data in the system datastore in a background thread
      private java.lang.String WebServlet.retweetersForm(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Gets a tweet from a tweetId and then finds a list of users who retweeted it in the form of a JSON string Saves examined data in the system datastore in a background thread
      private java.lang.String WebServlet.tweetFormRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Performs a twitter query using request data and returns tweets and their Ids in the form of a JSON string Saves examined data in the system datastore in a background thread
      private java.lang.String WebServlet.venuesFormRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Gets venues that match the conditions of the search and tweets from people who have checked into these venues in the form of a JSON string Saves examined data in the system datastore in a background thread
